trans-unit.source: This article provides an overview of the Azure Government Image Gallery and the images included
trans-unit.target: This article provides an overview of the Azure Government Image Gallery and the images included

trans-unit.source: <html></html> The Microsoft Azure Government image gallery is a similar experience to public Azure portal. Customers can choose to deploy pre-built images from Microsoft and our partners, or upload their own VHDs. This provides flexibility to deploy your own standardized images if needed.
trans-unit.target: <html></html> The Microsoft Azure Government image gallery is a similar experience to public Azure portal. Customers can choose to deploy pre-built images from Microsoft and our partners, or upload their own VHDs. This provides flexibility to deploy your own standardized images if needed.

trans-unit.source: The below provides a list of available images within the Azure Government image gallery.
trans-unit.target: The below provides a list of available images within the Azure Government image gallery.

trans-unit.source: Some of the prebuilt images do include pay as you go licensing for specific software.
trans-unit.target: Some of the prebuilt images do include pay as you go licensing for specific software.

trans-unit.source: Please review <html></html>Virtual Machine Pricing<html></html> page for more guidance and work with your Microsoft account team or reseller for Azure Government specific pricing.
trans-unit.target: Please review <html></html>Virtual Machine Pricing<html></html> page for more guidance and work with your Microsoft account team or reseller for Azure Government specific pricing.

trans-unit.source: At the heart of the Microsoft Cloud OS vision, Windows Server 2012 R2 brings Microsoft's experience delivering global-scale cloud services into your infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: At the heart of the Microsoft Cloud OS vision, Windows Server 2012 R2 brings Microsoft's experience delivering global-scale cloud services into your infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 incorporates Microsoft's experience building and operating public clouds, resulting in a dynamic, highly available server platform.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 incorporates Microsoft's experience building and operating public clouds, resulting in a dynamic, highly available server platform.

trans-unit.source: It offers a scalable, dynamic and multi-tenant-a...
trans-unit.target: It offers a scalable, dynamic and multi-tenant-a...
